subject: Parrot at YAPC::NA::2007 in Houston
body:
See below for the schedule of Perl 6 and Parrot-related talks at YAPC in 
2 weeks.

Will there be a time for a Parrot BOF there?

That kind of meetup would be good, since most of us don't get any F2F 
contact.

A BOF might also be valuable for setting an agenda for Parrot-oriented 
participants in the hackathon.

kid51
